text: Evelyna Christina "Evelyn" Wever-Croes (born 5 December 1966) is an Aruban politician and current Prime Minister of Aruba, serving since November 2017. She is the first woman to hold this office. She is a member of the People's Electoral Movement (MEP). ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Aruba Category:Current national leaders
title: Evelyn Wever-Croes
